text: The Greeks or Hellenes () are an ethnic group and nation native to regions including Greece, Cyprus, Italy, Egypt, Anatolia, and southern Albania. ==Diaspora== The Greeks also form a significant diaspora, with many Greek communities founded around the world. They speak the Greek language and are followers of the Christian Greek Orthodox Church. ==Related pages== * Hellenistic art * Ancient Greek * Ancient Greece * Byzantine Empire * Ancient Greek philosophy ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Europe
title: Greek people
